mapper.select: SELECT review_code, review_content, review_score FROM review

select review.review_code, review.book_code, review.review_content, review.review_score, review.review_image from review, admin, book, zone, site where admin.company_code = #{company_code} AND admin.admin_code = zone.admin_code And zone.zone_code = site.zone_code And site.site_code = book.site_code And book.book_code = review.book_code
